description: Gives a description of the Time to Live (TTL) status on the specified table.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table to be described. You can also provide the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table in this parameter.

nested_items.name: TimeToLiveStatus
nested_items.description: The TTL status for the table.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the TTL attribute for items in the table.
